Container.Name: Homey
Container.Overview: Homey Self-Hosted Server is based on Homey Pro’s operating system, but hosted on your own hardware. Extend with Homey Bridge to connect your Bluetooth, Zigbee, Z-Wave, 433 MHz, and Infrared devices.
Container.Requires: Extend with Homey Bridge to connect your Bluetooth, Zigbee, Z-Wave, 433 MHz, and Infrared devices.

Config.Name: Userdata Path
Config.Description: You can choose another path for your Homey Self-Hosted Server's userdata, if you like
